Minimalist Tab is a Chrome extension that simplifies your new tab page. 

It only shows you the essential two things you need to keep your week on track: the time and date. 

Nothing special, not overcrowded nor eye distracting. Just a minimalist new tab page for your productivity and peace of mind.
